en2: I felt worthless after the failure, but my mentor reminded me that I am worthy of respect.
I decided to adopt a healthier lifestyle this year.
I can access the database from my laptop.

I had a minor accident yesterday, and it was purely accidental.
I was appointed manager, and I scheduled an appointment with the team.
I approximated the total cost of the trip before booking.
I chose appropriate clothes for the interview.
I accidentally soaked my shoes in the rain.
I forgot my umbrella, hence I got soaked in the rain.
I grow basil, an herb, in my garden for cooking.
I learned that a cow is a herbivore and eats only plants.
I monitor my daily water intake to stay healthy.
I appreciate the intangible benefits of friendship and trust.
I try to maintain my integrity in every decision I make.
I rely on my intelligence to solve complex problems.
I have a vivid memory of my first day at school.
I recall my childhood summers vividly and often smile at the memories.
I reassured my friend that everything would be fine.
I tried to rebut his claim, and my rebuttal convinced some of the audience.
I sometimes rebel against strict rules, feeling rebellious at times.
I tried to stay positive after failure, hoping to rebound quickly.
I find it a paradox that technology can both connect and isolate people.
I study palaeontology to learn about ancient life on Earth.
I noticed the factory emit smoke, and the emission concerned the local community.
I am honored to meet the professor emeritus of the university.
I will elucidate the main points of the report in today's meeting.
vn1: (v) làm sáng tỏ, giải thích rõ

en2: I walked along the embankment to enjoy the river view.

I studied each element of the project carefully.

I disembarked from the ship as soon as it reached the harbor.
I embarked on a new career path after graduation.

I am a voracious learner, always seeking new knowledge.
I learned to weave beautiful patterns using colorful threads.
I accept the offer, but its acceptability depends on the final terms.
I joined an art academy because I've always been interested in academic studies.
I left because the manager was being abusive toward the staff.
I used the unemployment rate as an indicator of economic health.
I expect the court to indict the criminal, and the indictment will be announced tomorrow.
I enjoy good repute, avoid disrepute, and work with reputable people.
I managed to disprove the rumor with solid evidence.
I always dispose of garbage properly to protect the environment.
I reveal the truth to my friend, and this revelation changes our relationship.
I heard my voice reverberate through the empty hall.
I revere my teacher and show great reverence for her guidance.
I felt ridiculous wearing such an oversized hat in public.
I found it hard to adapt because of the company's rigid rules.
I underwent rigorous training before starting my new job.
I didn't want the heavy rain to ruin our picnic plans.

I can envision a future where renewable energy dominates, and I envisage myself contributing to that change.

I feel stable in my job now, but the market situation is still quite unstable.
I could barely utter a word after hearing his strange utterance.
I felt victimized at work because of my opinions.
I have learned to accept the vicissitudes of life with patience.
I was shocked by the vicious attack in the news.
I live in the vicinity of the city center, so I can walk to work.
I am trying to wean myself off caffeine by drinking more water.
I don't want to wear out my shoes too quickly.
I wiped the table after dinner to clean up the crumbs.

I couldn't help but yawn during the long meeting.
I checked my zodiac sign to see what the stars say about my future.
